AboutSection.name: Thierry Castro
AboutSection.description: A Brazilian passionate about music and technology, I've been deeply dedicated to programming over the past years. During this journey, I gained experience with several technologies and frameworks including TypeScript/JavaScript, and frontend/backend tools such as Next.js, Nest.js and Svelte.

projects.title: Modern E-commerce
projects.description: A conversion-optimized e-commerce platform focused on user experience.

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time data visualization system for strategic decision-making.

projects.title: Streaming Platform
projects.description: Video-on-demand application focused on high performance.

projects.title: Financial Management
projects.description: Finance control tool with custom reports.

projects.title: Minimalist Social Network
projects.description: A social network focused on simple interactions and no invasive algorithms.

projects.title: Personalized Training App
projects.description: App that generates personalized training plans using AI.

experiences.description: Currently working as a full stack developer on web applications in the travel and insurance sector. I use Ruby on Rails and Svelte to deliver scalable solutions with a focus on performance, maintainability, and user experience. I work on API integrations and continuous improvements to the user journey.

As an intern, I actively participated in the full software development cycle, from requirements analysis to deployment. I worked with Ruby on Rails and Svelte, solidifying my skills in both backend and frontend through real product development.

Provided personalized technical support to students in the Software Development program. Helped resolve frontend, backend, and programming logic questions, and contributed with code reviews and best practice guidance.
Conducted technical interviews with development candidates, evaluating problem-solving, code structure, and clarity. Provided constructive feedback to support individual improvement.

I work as a freelancer building complete web solutions—from robust APIs to responsive, modern interfaces. I use current technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, NestJS, Tailwind CSS, Svelte, among others. I handle diverse projects autonomously with a strong focus on performance, clear architecture, and high-quality delivery.

Higher education focused on object-oriented programming, web development, relational databases, data structures, computational logic, and software engineering. Complements my hands-on experience with solid technical foundations.
